# f5distributedcloud_api_credential (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_api_credential` resource manages API Credentials in F5 Distributed Cloud.

API Credentials are used for programmatic access to F5 XC APIs.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_api_credential" "example" {
  name            = "terraform-api-cred"
  namespace       = "system"
  credential_type = "API_CERTIFICATE"
  expiration_days = 365
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `credential_type` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `expiration_days` (Number)
- `virtual_k8s_name` (String) Name of the virtual K8s cluster (for KUBE_CONFIG type)
- `virtual_k8s_namespace` (String) Namespace of the virtual K8s cluster

### Read-Only

- `data` (String, Sensitive) The credential data (certificate or token)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
